name: Hi-Tech ITO
tagline: Enterprise Solutions with MS Dynamics CRM, AX, NAV
description:
Hi-Tech ITO, a division of Hi-Tech Outsourcing Services, is one of the leading software development and technology consulting company in India. We are a stable and capable partner to all our clients as we empower them to take hold of market opportunities, endow their people and operational efficiency from a partial solution to fully outsourced software development.
With a modest beginning in the year 1992, Hi-Tech ITO has successfully challenged norms, evolved with excellence & formed a robust-delivery model.
Service Offerings:
• Enterprise Solutions (Microsoft Dynamics NAV, AX & CRM)
• Enterprise Mobility
• Microsoft SharePoint
• Business Intelligence
• Custom Application Development
• Mobile Apps Development
• CMS Development
• Web Design & Development
We have successfully delivered more than 5,000 projects to our global client base exceeding 2,500+ clients, from small businesses to Fortune 500 multinationals in more than 50 countries, with 80% revenue generation through repeat business.
Hi-Tech is well equipped with professionals with deep domain expertise of Automotive, Healthcare, Construction, Heavy Engineering, Media/Publishing industries and Govt. /Public Sector.
To know more about our work and to get a free quote, drop us an email at info@hitechito.com
READ MORE...

locations.address: 14, Aaryans Corporate Park, Near Shilaj Railway Crossing Thaltej - Shilaj Road, Thaltej,
